member.name: T:TimeZoneMapper.TimeZoneMap
member.summary: Provides easy access to different "built-in" types of s.
member.remarks: The static properties and/or methods on this class are mostly convenience methods/properties; if you need more control (such as using a specific uri, cache TTL or timeout value for the or other options not provided by the "built-in" TZMappers/resources returned here) then you will need to instantiate your own instance (and maybe even implement your own ).

member.name: M:TimeZoneMapper.TimeZoneMap.CreateOnlineWithSpecificFallbackValuesTZMapper(TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.ITZMapper)
member.summary: Creates a that tries to use the online resource and, when unreachable or otherwise problematic, uses the specified as fallback.
member.param: The to use when the default fails for any reason.
member.returns: Returns the default unless it experiences any trouble; in that case the specified fallback will be returned.

member.name: M:TimeZoneMapper.TimeZoneMap.CreateOnlineWithSpecificFallbackValuesTZMapper(System.Uri,TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.ITZMapper)
member.summary: Creates a that tries to use the online resource and, when unreachable or otherwise problematic, uses the specified as fallback.
member.param: The URI to use when retrieving CLDR data.
The to use when the default fails for any reason.
member.returns: Returns the default unless it experiences any trouble; in that case the specified fallback will be returned.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.TimeZoneMap.DefaultValuesTZMapper
member.summary: Gets a that uses a built-in (and thus, possibly outdated) resource.

remarks.para: The mappings are based on the built-in data. The specific version of the resource can be retrieved by examining the and (or ) properties.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.TimeZoneMap.OnlineValuesTZMapper
member.summary: Gets a that uses a online (and thus, possibly 'unreachable') resource.

remarks.para: The mappings are retrieved from the online resource a single time (upon first usage) and used from there on. Consider that, between different runs of the application, different values may be returned when the online resource changes. The specific version of the resource can be retrieved by examining the and (or ) properties.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.TimeZoneMap.OnlineWithFallbackValuesTZMapper
member.summary: Gets a that tries to use the online resource and, when unreachable or otherwise problematic, uses the built-in resource as fallback.

remarks.para: Consider that, between different runs of the application, different values may be returned when the online resource changes or the online resource is out of sync with the current built-in resource and unreachable.

member.name: T:TimeZoneMapper.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.Properties.Resources.windowsZones
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE supplementalData SYSTEM "../../common/dtd/ldmlSupplemental.dtd"> <!-- Copyright Â© 1991-2013 Unicode, Inc. CLDR data files are interpreted according to the LDML specification (http://unicode.org/reports/tr35/) For terms of use, see http://www.unicode.org/copyright.html -->
<supplementalData> <version number="$Revision$"/> <generation date="$Date$"/>
<windowsZones> <mapTimezones otherVersion="7de0000" typeVersion="2013i">
<!-- (UTC-12:00) Internatio [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper
member.summary: Provides a base class for TimeZoneMapper objects.

member.name: M:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.TryGetTimeZone(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a TimeZone by it's Id, handling exceptions and returning null instead for invalid / not found Id's.
member.param: The time zone identifier, which corresponds to the Id property.
member.returns: Returns the TimeZone when found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.MapTZID(System.String)
member.summary: Maps a TimeZone ID (e.g. "Europe/Amsterdam") to a corresponding TimeZoneInfo object.
member.param: The TimeZone ID (e.g. "Europe/Amsterdam").
member.returns: Returns a .Net BCL object corresponding to the TimeZone ID.
member.exception: Thrown when the specified TimeZone ID is not found.
Thrown when the specified TimeZone ID is null.

member.name: M:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.GetAvailableTZIDs
member.summary: Builds an array of available TimeZone ID's and returns these as an array.
member.returns: Returns an array of all available ('known') TimeZone ID's.

member.name: M:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.GetAvailableTimeZones
member.summary: Builds an array of available objects that the mapper can return.
member.returns: Returns an array of available objects that the mapper can return.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.TZIDVersion
member.summary: Gets the TimeZoneID version part of the resource currently in use.
member.remarks: This value corresponds to the "typeVersion" attribute of the resource data.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.TZVersion
member.summary: Gets the TimeZoneInfo version part of the resource currently in use.
member.remarks: This value corresponds to the "otherVersion" attribute of the resource data.

member.name: P:TimeZoneMapper.TZMappers.BaseTZMapper.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the resource currently in use.
member.remarks: This value is a composite of ".".
